title: Pricing
subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

cancelAnytime.a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked.

paymentMethods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.a: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

generationTime.q: How long does video generation take?
generationTime.a: Most videos are generated within 2-5 minutes, depending on complexity.

apiAvailability.a: Yes, we provide REST API access for Enterprise plans.
